update od0000 set org_order_id = #{orgOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, delivery_type_cd = #{deliveryTypeCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, delivery_center_id = #{deliveryCenterId,jdbcType=CHAR}, delivery_area_cd = #{deliveryAreaCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, shipment = #{shipment,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_method = #{orderMethod,jdbcType=CHAR}, payment_type = #{paymentType,jdbcType=CHAR}, promotion_id = #{promotionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_date = #{orderDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, delivery_date = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, expire_date = #{expireDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, receive_date = #{receiveDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, vendor_address = #{vendorAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_address = #{storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_sts = #{orderSts,jdbcType=CHAR}, nr_flg = #{nrFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_remark = #{orderRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_vat_cd = #{purchaseVatCd,jdbcType=CHAR}, tax_rate = #{taxRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, order_amt = #{orderAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, order_tax = #{orderTax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, receive_amt = #{receiveAmt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, receive_tax = #{receiveTax,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, upload_flg = #{uploadFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, upload_date = #{uploadDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_ymd = #{createYmd,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_hms = #{createHms,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_ymd = #{updateYmd,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_hms = #{updateHms,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_screen_id = #{updateScreenId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_ip_address = #{updateIpAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nr_update_flg = #{nrUpdateFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, nr_ymd = #{nrYmd,jdbcType=CHAR}, nr_hms = #{nrHms,jdbcType=CHAR}, order_differentiate = #{orderDifferentiate,jdbcType=CHAR} where store_cd = #{storeCd,jdbcType=CHAR} and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select distinct a.upload_date, a.order_date, a.order_id, a.org_order_id, a.store_cd, -- f.store_name, CONCAT(f.store_name,'',f.store_name_en) store_name, a.receive_date, a.create_ymd as create_date, b.total_qty, a.order_amt, b.total_receive_qty, a.receive_amt, b.total_qty-b.total_receive_qty total_variance_qty, a.order_amt-a.receive_amt total_variance_amt from od0000 a left join ( select order_id, sum(receive_qty) total_receive_qty, sum(order_qty) total_qty from od0010 GROUP BY order_id) b on a.order_id = b.order_id left join ma2000 c on c.vendor_id = a.delivery_center_id, ma1000 f, cm9060 g where a.store_cd = f.store_cd and g.sp_id = '0000' and g.sp_value between f.effective_start_date and f.effective_end_date
and a.order_id = #{orderId}

select distinct a.order_date, a.order_id, a.org_order_id, a.vendor_id as delivery_center_id, d.vendor_name as delivery_center_name, a.store_cd, e.store_name, (select sum(order_qty) from od8030 where return_id = a.order_id) as total_qty, (select sum(order_amount) from od8030 where return_id = a.order_id) as total_amt from od0000 a left join od8030 b on b.return_id = a.order_id left join ma2000 d on d.vendor_id = a.delivery_center_id left join ma1000 e on e.store_cd = a.store_cd where a.order_type = '02' and a.order_differentiate = '0' and B.store_cd IN
#{store,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and A.order_date>=#{orderStartDate}
and #{orderEndDate}>= A.order_date
AND lower(A.order_id) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{orderId},'%'))
AND lower(A.org_order_id) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{orgOrderId},'%'))
AND lower(A.delivery_center_id) like lower(CONCAT('%',#{deliveryCenterId},'%'))
order by a.order_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into od0005(order_id) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ON CONFLICT (order_id) DO NOTHING;
